column2: Mar-a-Lago Partially Closed Due To COVID Outbreak
column5: With any luck at all it'll be condemned and bulldozed as a public health risk. Source: Associated Press WASHINGTON (AP) ‚Äî Former President Donald Trump‚Äôs Palm Beach Florida club has been partially closed because of a COVID-19 outbreak. That‚Äôs according to several people familiar with the situation including a club member who received a phone call informing them about the closure Friday. A receptionist at the Mar-a-Lago club confirmed the news saying it was closed until further notice but declined to comment further. A person familiar with club operations said that out of an abundance of caution they had ‚Äúpartially closed‚Äù a ‚Äúsection of the club‚Äù for a short period of time and quarantined some of its workers. The people spoke on condition of anonymity because they were not authorized to discuss the situation by name. The number of cases what portions of the club were closed or how it was affecting the former first family weren‚Äôt immediately clear. Representatives for Trump and the Florida Department of Health did not immediately respond to a phone call and email Friday seeking comment.
